import React from 'react'; import { Box, VStack, HStack, Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionIcon, AccordionPanel } from "@chakra-ui/react" /***************************************************************/ import { Button } from "../style_components/button" import { Text } from "../style_components/text" import { SymbolButton } from "./symbol_button" import { symbols } from "../ressources/symbols" /***************************************************************/ export function ManaCost(props) { function setManaCostFunction(symbol) { props.setManaCost(props.manaCost.concat(symbol)) } function setColorlessManaAmount(colorlessManaAmount) { props.setColorlessManaAmount(colorlessManaAmount + 1) } function resetValues() { props.setManaCost([]) props.setColorlessManaAmount(0) } return ( Mana cost : setColorlessManaAmount(props.colorlessManaAmount)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.White)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.Blue)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.Black)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.Red)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.Green)} />

More mana symbols

setManaCostFunction(symbols.Colorless)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridWU)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridWB)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridRW)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridRG)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridGU)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridGW)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridUB)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridUR)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridBR)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.HybridBG)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.TWhite)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.TBlue)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.TBlack)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.TRed)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.TGreen)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.PhyColorless)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.PhyWhite)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.PhyBlue)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.PhyBlack)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.PhyRed)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.PhyGreen)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.Snow)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.XColorless)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.XWhite)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.XBlue)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.XBlack)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.XRed)} /> setManaCostFunction(symbols.XGreen)} /> ); }
